collection.body:
#IndyRef Stamps

To mark the occasion of the Scottish independance referendum I designed a set of commemorative stamps, I hand painted a selection of politions from both sides of the debate. David Cameron, Alex Salmond, Ed Miliband & Nicola Sturgeon.
collection.summary: To mark the occasion of the Scottish independance referendum I designed a set of commemorative stamps, I hand painted a selection of politions from both sides of the debate. David Cameron, Alex Salmond, Ed Miliband & Nicola Sturgeon.
collection.title: #IndyRef Stamps
